short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phishing-resistant protection for TraitWare Passwordless MFA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TraitWare browser extension provides phishing-resistant protection for all of your TraitWare-enabled logins. It works seamlessly with your login experience. Register once to the extension for enhanced security and it will further protect all of your passwordless logins.
